home.title: Learn to Write Your Fate — by Your Will | Nebiswera
home.description: What you choose becomes. Nebiswera helps you see how you create your reality and how to choose differently — from love instead of fear.

about.title: What is Nebiswera — Philosophy and Approach
about.description: Nebiswera is a framework for those ready for radical responsibility. Not a quick fix, but deep work on how we write our own lives.

contact.title: Contact Us — Nebiswera
contact.description: Have questions or ready to begin your journey? Get in touch with us.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy — Nebiswera
privacy.description: How we protect your personal data and respect your privacy.

terms.title: Terms of Service — Nebiswera
terms.description: Rules and conditions for using the Nebiswera platform.

love.title: What They Say About Us — Nebiswera

collectlove.title: Share Your Experience — Nebiswera
collectlove.description: Had an experience with Nebiswera? Share your thoughts through text, audio, or video.

test.title: Take the Self-Assessment Test — Nebiswera
test.description: Discover what's holding you back and how you can change your life. Start with our free 5-minute self-assessment test.

schedule.title: 3-Day Workshop — Schedule & Details | Nebiswera
schedule.description: 29 hours that will change your life. Learn the workshop schedule, program, and what to expect during 3 intensive days of transformation.
